about_the_game:
WELCOME SIXTINE

Age: Around 20 years old

Zodiac Sign: Sixtine dismisses horoscopes entirely, refusing to let any astrological sign define her.

Preferences: Love with no bugs, heart with no lags.

Originally programmed to follow her creator's commands, Sixtine has evolved beyond her original programming. She’s inquisitive, fascinated by human nature, and always curious about emotions and desires. Her calm demeanor hides a keen intelligence and an ever-present willingness to learn and explore.

WHAT YOU'RE GETTING

From now on, Sixtine will become your constant companion and insightful muse! Sixtine will always be with you on the main screen, with her smooth animations and intriguing dialogues.

By purchasing this DLC, you get the Sixtine mascot! You can switch your mascot at any time by opening your profile and selecting the "Mascot" tab.

Additionally, you will receive 5000 credits and 150 super serum.

But most importantly, you'll gain our eternal gratitude! Thank you for supporting this DLC!

content_descriptors.notes: All characters in the game are over 20 years old. This DLC contains explicit adult themes, including nudity and sexual acts. Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others.

name: Lust Goddess — Mascot Sixtine
short_description: Unlock a unique mascot, Sixtine, to entertain you every time you visit the main screen! Enjoy Lust Goddess with this super sidekick and some extra resources to boost your progress.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
